title: Springfield Armory National Historic Site: Schedule Of Events
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Schedule Of Events              Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 4 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Springfield Armory National Historic Site 100 Years: A Century of Service      Time: 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM Location: Springfield Armory National Historic Site Visitor Center Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 06/01/2016 to 02/28/2017 Our latest special exhibit is dedicated to the 2016 Centennial of the National Park Service and traces connection between Springfield Armory and other National Park sites while celebrating these special places. View Details      Springfield Armory National Historic Site Centennial Visions Sculpture Exhibition      Time: 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM Location: Springfield Armory National Historic Site Fees: Free!     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 06/18/2016 to 08/22/2016 Springfield Armory is hosting seven sculptures as part of the joint exhibit "Centennial Visions."  The works exhibited offer sculptures that use many of the same materials once used for the production of military firearms. View Details      Springfield Armory National Historic Site Are You Smarter Than A Park Ranger?      Time: 2:00 PM to 2:45 PM Location: Springfield Armory National Historic Site Fees: FREE!     Saturday, August 27, 2016 How well do you know your National Parks? Join Ranger Susan Ashman for this fun and interactive trivia program highlighting some of our lesser known National Park sites.  View Details      Springfield Armory National Historic Site Curator's Corner: Artifacts from the Vault      Time: 2:00 PM to 3:00 PM Location: Springfield Armory National Historic Site Fees: FREE!     Saturday, September 10, 2016 Join Curator Alex MacKenzie for an up-close and in-depth presentation of items from the Springfield Armory's collection. View Details
